sentences.sContent: But I also use it on baked potatoes, salads, tofu, and dozens of other foods.
sentences.sCn: 但是，我也用它来混合烤土豆，沙拉，豆腐，和几十个其他食物。

sentences.sContent: Soy products like tofu, tempeh and fortified soymilk do double duty in this regard since they provide both calcium and protein.
sentences.sCn: 大豆食品像豆腐、豆豉和强化豆奶在这方面有双重功能，因为它们可同时提供钙和蛋白。

trans.tranOther: a soft white food made from  soya beans , used in cooking instead of meat
